title: (x) Face with spiky serifs in The Weekend Australian Magazine - Constantia {Dan Beltechi}
content:
Hi,

I came across this typeface in The Weekend Australian Magazine. It has quite distinctive spiky serifs, but I do not know what typeface it is ... wondering if anyone here might?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202075126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Voila_Capture12_6453.png)

Thanks,  
Lawrence
author: lcmartin

comments.content: Based on just "Extreme greenies" (slow connection...), I think it's [Constantia](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202075126/http:/www.ascendercorp.com/font/constantia/).
